alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 6:55PM EDT until August 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 654 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carrabelle, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Yent Place, Carrabelle Beach, St George Island St Pk, Royal Bluff and Green Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
